Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.similarity

Prepared queries for similarity functions.

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
SimilarityQuery<O,D extends Distance<?>> A similarity query serves as adapter layer for database and primitive similarity functions.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDBIDSimilarityQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>> Run a database query in a database context.
AbstractSimilarityQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>> A distance query serves as adapter layer for database and primitive similarity functions.
PrimitiveSimilarityQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>> Run a database query in a database context.
